you
[Music]
hi and welcome you listening to the x-22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1430 for a n today's date is
November 28th 2017 and the title of the
episode is hundreds of European banks
are in trouble this is going to be a
disaster let's get into the economic
collapse financial news now we've been
watching the precious metals market and
we noticed in the last couple of weeks
there's been a lot of paper contracts
thrown at gold and it's brought down the
price and we've known we've noticed that
this is continually happening and it
happens around 9:30 or so in the morning
Eastern Standard Time and once again
gold was slammed down this morning
silver was also slammed back below $17
now these slam downs are now happening
more often which tells us they don't
want gold and silver to rise they're
trying to keep everyone distracted
thinking that everything is great that
the dollar is fantastic gold and silver
they're not going anywhere and this
tells us that we're getting closer and
closer to the system completely ripping
itself apart and if we look at the
crypto market we can see that the crypto
currencies they are going up like
there's no tomorrow and of course people
are out there saying there's a bubble
happening but again there are many
people out there that don't even know
how to get into the crypto market they
hear about it they know something's
going on but still it's a very small
piece of the pie that are actually
dealing in crypto currencies and we see
right now that the crypto market kind of
emulates what gold and silver should be
doing right now and I think this is why
the central bankers and those in power
getting a little worried and this is why
they're continually keeping the gold and
silver prices down and once again like I
said before we should be looking at
everything not just let move we should
be in gold and silver we should just be
encrypt Oh
currencies we should be in everything a
little bit here a little bit there
diversified even dollars because when
the system comes down you're gonna need
dollars what we see inflation
occurring and people are out there
trying to purchase their goods you're
going to use the dollars first the
cryptocurrency and the gold will be used
much later you'll probably move into
bartering before you even touch any of
the other things the other things are to
maintain your wealth and most likely
down the line we might go into an
electronic currency like crypto currency
where if you have gold you can use it to
buy some crypto coins and things like
that so we need to look at the entire
picture here not just one little thing
we also see the retail market is a
complete and utter disaster and I know
that the corporate media they're all out
there and I hear people saying wow this
Black Friday was fantastic just listen
to what the news is saying I can't
believe how much better it is cyber
monday they're saying it's incredible
but once again you need to look at what
has happened during this year now the
number of retail store closes in 2017
has already tripled the number from 2016
last year there was about 2000 stores
that closed this year were already up to
67 hundred and we could see right now
that this is shattered all-time records
because in 2008 the all-time record was
61 hundred stores so if we're in this
incredible recovery well why are all
these stores closing now of course I
know people are gonna be out there
saying and of course two people listen
to me are not gonna say it but other
people are gonna say well it's all going
to online again online sales only makes
up around 10% of the entire retail
market and it's not a one-to-one
transfer over to Amazon Amazon has been
around for a very long time it's not
like they just popped up and said hey
we're taking all your business they've
been around for a very long time yes the
online market is growing but it's not
the market yet it's only ten eleven
percent of the entire retail market what
we're seeing right now is that all of
these stores that are closing well they
just don't have the traffic they don't
have the sales people aren't out there
purchasing that's what's really
happening
now and we see there's a lot of
retailers that have gone bankrupt
already and I'm going to tell you right
now just from the data that's coming in
not what the corporate media is telling
you not the propaganda about how great
cyber my cyber monday is in Black Friday
and once again if these days are so
great they wouldn't have to extend any
of the sales once you hear someone
saying well we're going to extend cyber
monday because it's been so great now
that tells you that cyber monday is not
that great and they're gonna continue on
with the sale to try to get more sales
because it's not what they thought it
was going to be and they're below the
number of sales that they thought they
should have so this is what we're
hearing right now and this is why they
started the Black Friday sales way ahead
of schedule this is why they wanted
stores open on Thanksgiving which really
didn't work out in the past and they
continually trying all these different
things to try to boost sales but what
we're seeing is that people aren't going
out and purchasing yes you're gonna hear
that oh mobile sales are on the rise of
course apps are getting better but it
did it take over the entire retail
market the brick-and-mortar no just
because you hear what they're saying
that oh it's doing a lot better or this
is the most popular online way to
purchase doesn't mean that sales are
great it's a propaganda move to make you
think that things are doing better but
when you look at the hard numbers here
like the traffic to all these stores
you're looking at four to six percent
decline of traffic compared to last year
and last year was a complete disaster
and once we get these retail numbers
we're gonna see that it's gonna be a lot
worse than what they're saying we see
that Case Shiller is out there and again
they have this 20-city composite and
they're saying that houses are surging
like we've never seen before they're up
by six point one nine percent now
remember in the 20 cities they can
control what is going on they can keep
houses off the market and again this
doesn't apply to the rest of the country
the only can control certain number of
cities and what we're seeing right now
in all of these cities like Boston
like we're seeing in Seattle we're
seeing that the housing bubble housing
bubble number two is way above housing
bubble number one now in Boston it's 13
percent higher than the housing bubble
back in 2007 going into 2008 in Seattle
it's 20 percent higher than it was back
in 2007-2008 Denver it's 44 percent
higher Dallas it's 42 percent higher
Atlanta 2.7 percent higher Portland 20%
higher San Francisco 27 percent higher
New York 19 percent higher and what
we're seeing right now is that this
housing bubble 22.0 is gigantic and
again when it comes crashing down and we
can see across America outside of these
20 cities there are people that are
sitting on their homes the value of the
homes are decreasing it's getting harder
to sell the houses and they're trying to
keep this together as best they can in
the Central Bank's what they're trying
to do is they're trying to keep all this
together because they know if this whole
thing falls apart it's on their watch
this is why they're trying to create
some type of distraction we see that
wholesale inventories well they plunged
in October by 0.4 percent and this was
absolutely awful and we're probably
going to see a drop in GDP now these GDP
numbers as we know they're completely
manipulated and even though they come
out with a three percent or two point
nine percent when you strip away
everything else on all the manipulation
we're really looking at a one point two
percent a one point three percent if you
look at John Williams and shadow stat
when he's using the calculation going
back a couple years we're looking at GDP
numbers in the negative range and that
tells us something that all of this had
to be manipulated just to convince you
that the economy's doing well now we
know that the banks went through all
these different stress tests we know
that Europe had their stress test the
Fed had the stress test here in the
United States and we know right now
because been looking at all the European
banks many of them are in saw
many of them are in trouble many of them
have a lot of non-performing loans that
exceed tangible capital and the ratios
are above 100% and when we look at Italy
we can see there's about a hundred and
fourteen Italian banks that have
non-performing loans that exceed
tangible capital the ratios are above
100% now when we look at this there's a
little gauge called the Texas ratio and
it was developed by Gerard Cassidy and
and others at RBC Capital Markets it is
a cow it's calculated by dividing the
value of the lenders non-performing
assets by the sum of its tangible common
equity capital and loan loss reserves
and basically what they're saying is if
the number is above 100% the bank is in
trouble now if we look we can see that
in Italy there is about twenty four
banks where there non-performing loans
total two-hundred percent or more and
when we look at this we can see that
they are in big big trouble and this is
going to spread to other banks because
they're all interconnected with
derivatives now if we go back in time
and we check out the Texas ratio and see
how it performed during the 80s during
the 90s we can see that banks tended to
fail when the ratio reached one-to-one
or 100% and if we go back to 1980 we can
see the yes the banks reach this and
they fail to go back to the 1990s guess
what the banks failed because they
reached this point and he's out there
saying that yes we can see this all
throughout the United States throughout
Europe that there's many banks that have
reached this percentage and they're on
the cusp of completely imploding and
it's not just in Italy it's in Spain
it's in France it's in Germany it's in
the United States and all these banks
once again are interconnected which
tells us that we're headed for this
great disaster and we can see that the
central bankers they've been preparing
getting ready for this brand-new system
we see the bricks they're establishing
their own
gold trading system they're going to
re-evaluate and create a new benchmark
for gold we can see already that the
payment system is out in China
Manufacturing is out in China there's
already a petrol yuyuan so when we look
at this we can see slowly but surely
doesn't happen overnight they've been
planning this for quite a while it took
them many many years to move everything
out of the United States and to
establish it someplace else like China
Russia and they're continually doing
doing this and they haven't stopped this
is why you need to be ready and prepared
you can see from the slamming down of
the gold and silver prices they are very
worried about what is about to happen
because I think once this breaks once
the system breaks down we're gonna see
gold and silver shoot up just like the
crypto currencies where the central
bank's can't control it it's like the
Wild West and people are putting their
funds into this because this is a free
and open market it's not centralized
it's decentralized and they realize that
no one is really controlling this
compared to the precious metal precious
metals market where the central bank the
bank's they're controlling everything
the stock market they're controlling
that they control the currencies of the
world and once the precious metals
market breaks free and it will break
free we're gonna see gold and silver
completely shoot up most likely almost
like crypto currencies because if you
take the calculations going all the way
back prior to the Great Depression gold
and silver right now should be someplace
between seven and eight thousand dollars
for gold and four and five hundred
dollars around four for silver and we
can see that this number could be even
higher because of what is happening
around the world and how people are
trying to protect their wealth so you
need to get prepared because everyone
when I say everyone I'm talking about
the central banks the banking system the
establishment they're getting prepared
and ready to move this to a new system
and you want to weather the storm you
want
dollarz you want to have cryptocurrency
you went up gold and silver you wanna
have food supplies water because when
this does happen you're going to need
all of this and when is it going to
happen well it could happen tomorrow
it can happen three months for now four
months from now those people who haven't
prepared start preparing because if you
have those three months you have three
months to prepare if you have six months
you have six months to prepare those
people who have been preparing continue
to do so you can prepare some more
because once again just like in
2007-2008 going into 2009 all of a
sudden with the snap of a finger
everything fell apart we're going to see
the same thing happen once again
listen everyone thanks a lot for
listening be well be safe and especially
be prepared thanks a lot

you
